header.unknown: This might be a temporary issue. Please try refreshing.

card.percentData: Failed {times} times, total downtime {duration}, daily availability {percent}%
card.summaryData: Failed {times} times in the last {days} days, total downtime {duration}, average availability {percent}%
card.errorText: Interface call limit exceeded or request error. Please try again later.

type.tip: Check if the site is running properly every {interval} for {type}
type.HTTP: Monitor the availability of the target service by sending HTTP or HTTPS requests
type.KEYWORD: Get the page content and check if the returned content contains the specified keyword
type.PING: Send a Ping request to the target server using the ICMP protocol
type.PORT: Check if the specified port of the target server is open
type.HEARTBEAT: The monitored service actively sends a 'heartbeat signal' to the monitoring service to indicate that it is running normally

meta.fastTip: Refreshing too frequently. Please try again later.

login.tip: The site is password protected. Please enter the password to view.
